positive_examples: This is an example of citric acid.
The citric acid demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed citric acid in this context.
A typical case of citric acid would involve these features.
The concept of citric acid applies here.
A weak organic acid naturally found in citrus fruits and widely used as a food preservative and flavoring agent.
negative_examples: This is an example of sulfuric acid, not citric acid.
This represents chemical acid in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: SulfuricAcid, or other types of ChemicalAcid

definition: A weak organic acid found in citrus fruits, used as a food additive.
